repairedDockerfile:
FROM debian:latest 
MAINTAINER adam.olenderski@gmail.com 
RUN apt-get update && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y man less vim curl wget sendemail sudo && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN adduser --home /home/ace --shell /bin/bash ace && usermod -G sudo ace 
USER ace 
RUN echo set -o vi >> ~/.bashrc && \  
echo export PAGER=less >> ~/.bashrc && \  
echo export VISUAL=vi >> ~/.bashrc && \  
echo export EDITOR=vi >> ~/.bashrc 
WORKDIR /home/ace
